Required:

### Nested Schema for `retention_config.monthly_retention`

Required:

- `months` (Number) Number of months for which the monthly backup to retain

Optional:

- `common_schedule` (Block List, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--retention_config--monthly_retention--common_schedule))
- `month_specific_schedule` (Block List) Which days of a week, the backup should be made available for the Data Access Policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--retention_config--monthly_retention--month_specific_schedule))

<a id="nestedblock--retention_config--monthly_retention--common_schedule"></a>
### Nested Schema for `retention_config.monthly_retention.common_schedule`

Required:

- `dates` (List of Number) Dates in a month to retain monthly backups for
- `last_day_of_month` (Boolean) Number of months for which the monthly backup to retain


<a id="nestedblock--retention_config--monthly_retention--month_specific_schedule"></a>
### Nested Schema for `retention_config.monthly_retention.month_specific_schedule`

Required:

Required:

- `days` (Number) Number of days for which the pitr backups to retain


<a id="nestedblock--retention_config--weekly_retention"></a>
### Nested Schema for `retention_config.weekly_retention`

Required:

- `days` (List of String) Which days of a week, the backup should be made available for the Data Access Policy
- `weeks` (Number) Number of weeks for which the weekly backup to retain


<a id="nestedblock--retention_config--yearly_retention"></a>
### Nested Schema for `retention_config.yearly_retention`

Required:

- `years` (Number) Number of years for which the yearly backup to retain
